content.label: Many different interfaces overlap and I can’t reach the buttons to close them. I just built a ride and can’t even open it because the park rating is in the way. Makes me a little angry when I paid $6.00 for a game that I can’t even play properly.
Love
If you’re planning on playing this on your iPhone. I recommend not to do this. Everything is way to small and convoluted. I would only get this if you have an iPad.
I wasn’t’ alive when RCT was in it’s prime,but oh,each game after RCT3 was TRASH!!!But, this is just RCT, nothing is different and I like this :)
The zoom is completely off for this game on an iPhone 11. It is unplayable.
The best tycoon game ever made it’s exactly like the old PC version definitely worth the buy

title.label: Perfect... just the same as you remember.

content.label: Remember running into the computer room, booting up your old family computer, and playing for hours and hours? That same feeling has been encapsulated on your iPhone. Take this timeless game with you anywhere and feel like a kid once more! Fabulous game, now on to the sims classic...
I really enjoy this game, at first it was a bit confusing, but after I got used to it I couldn’t stop playing

title.label: Great game, needs a few small fixes

content.label:
Absolutely love the game. Played the game on PC growing up, beyond excited it’s on Mobile. 

Please update the game for it to be iPhone X and newer friendly. Graphics get cut off from the upscaling from the 16:9 version for iPhone 8 and older phones. 

Also for the X version, please make the home bar go away during gameplay it covers up alerts.

title.label: Thank you for developing one of my favorite games to be playable on my iPad

content.label: There’s so much to this classic game, and it’s all here. There are some small UI things I wish they added, but nothing worth subtracting a star for. This is a must have for any iPad gamer.

The game is the greatest will be played forever just wish you can updated it to like the full game actually when u can build your own park set your entrance prices and etc but overall greatest game and Smartest idea to bring it to ios.

When you build a coaster towards the ground, it does not automatically go underground and shift views like in the original, so you have to manually raise/lower terrain for making underground coasters. Also, there is no way to change park admission from free to charging a price. When you select the handymen, they are green instead of automatic red like the OG. really fun game but it makes it much more difficult to build underground paths and coasters! It is also difficult to remove trees without going through many processes
Terrible crashes and freezes, save corruption

This is easily the best game I’ve ever downloaded on my phone, it is exactly the same as the RCT / RCT2 games for pc. The phone controls work extremely well, I’ve seen other reviews complaining that they do not fit on newer iPhones, but everything fits and works on my 11 Pro max as of 6/21. This game is absolutely worth $4.99 it is both challenging and intuitive. The environment is timeless, elegant, and the overall gameplay is very satisfying. It is the polar opposite of the rct mobile game released years ago. It is not a “pay to win” game. There are in-app purchases, but they are only for expansion packs, just as you would see in any other game.  6/5 stars
The corners of the screen are cut off on any phone with a notch. Please update to fix this problem.

When playing this game on both Android and iPadOS, the zoom views do not increase the pixel resolution like they used to for the original game. It even shows in the screenshots that it is supposed to. I was really hoping It would work on a new mobile os. Atari support still hasn’t helped. It makes the game unplayable.
It’s very annoying how the screen is cut off. Considering I just payed 6$ for this old game, can you like you know. Take the time to update it?

Love playing this game, simple but challenging. Great port. Only complaint! I just upgraded to a new iPhone 11 and the edges are cut off. I hope a patch will allow me to adjust the screen. Great game!
I got it and I was so excited. My brother got it to and loved it. We both got 1 roller coaster and I could almost feel being on it.
The game isn’t very compatible with iPhone 11 cause of the notch it makes it hard to play..

title.label: Great! But Could Use Some Reconfigurations

content.label:
Hey Atari! Glad you brought this game to iOS. I am unable to find where to give feedback on gameplay, so hopefully you see this review.
My main problem is building a coaster manually where the top of dialog box is hidden behind other menu buttons at the top left. I am unable to relocate or adjust or exit the dialog box because I am pressing other menus in front of it. I cannot complete my own builds and open the attraction.
I have an iPhone 11 Pro with the standard screen size, so this may be the problem. Please fix this issue so the game works on all screen sizes.

I have the iPhone 11 and with the curved screen and the notch I can’t get to controls without due to the curve and the icons half cut off in said curve. Love the game tho. Just hard to play on newer iPhones

I adore playing this game and it brings back so many great memories!! The only thing is that the app keeps shutting off on my phone and iPad while playing Magic Quarters. I get to August of year 1 and without fail it shuts off and won’t let me play on. No big deal with only one park, but I can’t open a new collection of parks because of it.

Love this game! I remember back in the day there was the sandbox option but it’s not available on this game. It’d be great if that could happen. I played a version on my iPad awhile ago that had it and you were given all options of rides, stalls, decorations, etc.

title.label: Better than the Original Computer Game

content.label: Best $6 I’ve ever spent on a game/app. I played this all the time when I was young on the PC and now I find this even better. I love how you can assign your handymen and mechanics to specific sections.

title.label: Just like the original PC version

content.label: I used to play this game as a child when in came out on PC. It was cool to get the chance to play it again. It’s exactly the same as I remember it. Worth every penny spent, which wasn’t very much either. One thing that would be awesome is if they could make zoo tycoon as well. I remember that one being really fun too. I would definitely pay to play that again.
The game is unplayable on my device. The windows default to the corner and the roller coaster build window cannot be moved or closed once you open it.
Back in 2013 now on my phone!
Addicting and amazing!! Just like the original version I loved as a kid. I spend hours a day on each level I give this app a 10/10

title.label: Incredible Except For a Few Things!

content.label:
It’s the RCT you know and love.

Devs- please fix:
-No Entry signs don’t work - guests pass right through them!
-Make hide scenery/etc. option toggle on and off instead of turning them automatically off once something gets built

I’ve played this game for a couple months now without problem, but suddenly it won’t open. I’ve searched the internet for solutions and tried everything, but the game still won’t open. Hopefully I can find a fix, because I feel cheated out of $5. Until then, 1 star.
All done with the game please add more scenarios
Absolutely love it. Talk about a blast from the pst! Just like back in the day. My only concern is it needs to be optimized for iPhone 11.
I am now using this on an iPad and it’s great because of the screen size, however the audio doesn’t work AT ALL. It was patchy on my phone but is completely nonfunctional on my iPad. Please update 😕
It’s a very good game, there are only a few things you cannot do outside your imagination... the only downfall is that sometimes it’s hard to unlock different parks

title.label: An Exceptional App that Exceeds Expectations

content.label: Wow. This app is a carbon copy of the full computer game. I don’t know how they managed to capture every single aspect of this very layered computer simulation game and put it on our small touch screen smartphones. It’s amazing. Nothing falls short. It was worth paying for without a doubt. I can shut down my phone and close the app, and once I open the app again it will be right where I left off in the midst of gameplay. I switched phones without doing a backup and downloaded the app again and it was playing where I left off. This app deserves getting accolades.

title.label: It’s Great, just buggy on the iPhone X and iPhone 11

content.label: I have an iPhone 11, and when playing, if I accidentally slide down into the control center or into a menu on my phone, the game mutes/pauses itself and when I unpause the game, there is no sound! This means that every time I accidentally slide into a menu on my phone, I have to restart the game if I want to play with sound. (Which I do.) I also wish that there was a way to make the user interface larger for those of us with bigger screens, and have it configured for iPhone X and 11 so that some of the buttons aren’t cut off. It is very difficult to press many of the buttons because of this issue, and the game is sometimes unplayable. I hope that these issues get fixed soon so that I can actually enjoy this game in all of its glory!

title.label: Excellent mobile version of the original game

content.label: This app works flawlessly just as the PC version. Love having it available anywhere I am. For me, this game just hasn’t been beaten by any of the new installments for rollercoaster tycoon. This is truly a classic that still works 20 years later.
Great game but doesn’t work with iPhone X
This I such a great game I love it I used to play the pc version when I was younger. I love the iOS version a lot

I love this app but once I upgraded to an iPhone 11, I can no longer access certain features. I can’t save me game and leave to go to another one and I can’t rename anything because some of the screen gets cut off. Please make an updated version or update! Thanks!!!

title.label: Thank you so much for doing this!

content.label: True to the original!
Great game but when I try to adjust screen size to fit my phone the app crashes everytime
This has everything the original game had but more like the scenarios from RollerCoaster tycoon 2 I love the game and it’s two dlc packs and the scenario editor and it for six dollars is worth it

I click the expansion pack it’s just said purchasing progress 
For hours it’s wont transaction

The game overall is exactly like the old PC version with some added bonuses and fun gamemodes. 
My only complaint is that it is not updated anymore, and for new iPhones the X and 11 the game is too stretched and some of the User Interfaces are blocked by the camera and top speaker part. In short resize the game so that it fits new phones.

title.label: Not for a 7 year old with adult playing too

content.label: We couldn’t even figure out how to make roller coasters.

I bought RCT on my iPhone 11 for something to do during quarantine. It’s a great game, no noticeable difference in gameplay or quality compared to the Android version. But, the sound will either completely drop completely, or it simply won’t have any sound when the game is first opened. I have to open Spotify and start playing a song for RCT’s sound to start working again. If you guys could fix that I would absolutely give 5 stars. Optimization for new devices would be nice as well.
Not yet compatible with iPad pro
Was it always this safe?! I’m just trying to build a death park
